newsitem.title: SIERRA LEONE: 30 drown in Sierra Leone boat disaster.
newsitem.headline: 30 drown in Sierra Leone boat disaster.

text.p: Thirty passengers drowned and more than 30 went missing when a crowded motorised canoe hit a rock and capsized in a river near the Sierra Leone capital Freetown, police said on Wednesday.
They told reporters that more than 80 people had been packed into the canoe when it overturned on the River Rokel about 25 km (15 miles) outside the capital on Tuesday night.
Thirty bodies and 20 survivors were pulled out. Survivors said the canoe, travelling from the Guinean capital Conakry, had been overloaded.
